spec_data.Name: python2-tools
spec_data.Description:
This package includes several tools to help with the development of Python 2
programs, including IDLE (an IDE with editing and debugging facilities), a
color editor (pynche), and a python gettext program (pygettext.py).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 16 Aug 2017 09:57:53 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A collection of development tools included with Python 2
